languages.text: {n}Хоть Ризза и пытается отшутиться, в ее взгляде мелькает тревога, а рука сама тянется к чему-то спрятанному под рубашкой на груди, будто стараясь еще больше укрыть это от вашего взгляда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хоть Ризза и пытается отшутиться, в ее взгляде мелькает тревога, а рука сама тянется к чему-то спрятанному под рубашкой на груди, будто стараясь еще больше укрыть это от вашего взгляда.{/n}

languages.text: {n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there is anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest as if she is trying to further hide it from your gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хоть Ризза и пытается отшутиться, в ее взгляде мелькает тревога, а рука сама тянется к чему-то спрятанному под рубашкой на груди, будто стараясь еще больше укрыть это от вашего взгляда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there's anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest, as if she's trying to hide it from you some more.{/n}

{n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there is anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest as if she is trying to further hide it from your gaze.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，莱萨想以玩笑的方式来回答你的问题，但她的眼神中充满了焦虑。她似乎在有意逃避你的目光，她的手不自觉地伸向胸前衣服下面藏着的某个东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there is anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest as if she is trying to further hide it from your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，莱萨想以玩笑的方式来回答你的问题，但她的眼神中充满了焦虑。她的手不自觉地伸向胸前衣服下面藏着的某个东西，似乎并不打算告诉你真相。{/n}

languages.text: {n}リザは冗談っぽく喋ろうとするも、その目は恐怖に満ちている。その手は無意識にシャツか胸の下に隠された何かへと伸ばされており、まるであなたから隠そうとしているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there is anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest as if she is trying to further hide it from your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}リザは冗談っぽく喋ろうとするも、その目は恐怖に満ちている。その手は無意識にシャツか胸の下に隠された何かへと伸ばされており、まるであなたから隠そうとしているかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por mucho que Ryzza intente hacer de todo una broma, hay ansiedad en su mirada y su mano busca inconscientemente algo oculto en el pecho, bajo su camisa, como si intentara protegerlo de tus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there is anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest as if she is trying to further hide it from your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por mucho que Ryzza intente hacer de todo una broma, hay ansiedad en su mirada y su mano busca inconscientemente algo oculto bajo el pecho de su camisa, como si intentara ocultártelo un poco más.{/n}

languages.text: {n}So sehr Ryzza auch versucht, einen großen Witz aus allem zu machen: In ihren Augen liegt Unruhe, und ihre Hand greift unbewusst nach etwas, was unter ihrem Hemd auf ihrer Brust verborgen liegt, als würde sie versuchen, es noch mehr vor deinem Blick zu verstecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there is anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest as if she is trying to further hide it from your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}So sehr Ryzza auch versucht, einen großen Witz aus allem zu machen: In ihren Augen liegt Unruhe, und ihre Hand greift unbewusst nach etwas, was unter ihrem Hemd auf ihrer Brust verborgen liegt, als würde sie versuchen, es noch mehr vor dir zu verstecken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ryzza a beau tenter de rire de vos accusations, vous lisez de l'inquiétude dans son regard et sa main cherche inconsciemment quelque chose sous sa chemise, comme si elle voulait le cacher un peu plus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there is anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest as if she is trying to further hide it from your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza a beau tenter de tourner vos accusations en plaisanterie, vous lisez de l'anxiété dans son regard et sa main cherche inconsciemment quelque chose sous sa chemise, comme si elle voulait le cacher un peu plus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ryzza durumu şakaya vurmaya çalışsa da gözlerinden endişe içinde olduğu anlaşılıyor. Gömleğinin altında gizlediği bir nesneye elini farkında olmadan götürerek sanki onu daha iyi saklamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As much as Ryzza is trying to turn it all into a joke, there is anxiety in her eyes, and her hand is reaching unconsciously for something concealed under her shirt on her chest as if she is trying to further hide it from your gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza durumu şakaya vurmaya çalışsa da gözlerinden endişe içinde olduğu anlaşılıyor. Gömleğinin altında gizlediği bir nesneye elini farkında olmadan götürerek sanki onu daha iyi saklamaya çalışıyor.{/n}
